select a.*,t.applytype_name,p1.name as passiveName,p2.name as writeName,d.department_name from t_apply as a, t_applytype as t, t_department as d,t_personalinfo as p1,t_personalinfo as p2 where a.apply_typeid=t.applytype_id and a.passive_id=p1.job_id and a.write_id=p2.job_id and a.write_id=d.manager_id and p1.department_id=d.department_id
and applytype_name like '${applytype_name}%'
and state like '${state}%'
and p1.department_id like '${department_id}%'
LIMIT #{before},#{after}

and applytype_name like '${applytype_name}%'
